title: Entrepreneurship Bootcamp
expert_experience: Serial entrepreneur with 3 successful exits, venture capital partner, mentor at Y Combinator
description: An intensive bootcamp covering all aspects of starting and scaling a business. Topics include idea validation, funding strategies, growth hacking, and building resilient business models.

title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
expert_experience: ML researcher at OpenAI, Ph.D. in Computer Science from MIT, 25+ published papers on ML algorithms
description: A beginner-friendly introduction to machine learning concepts, algorithms, and practical applications. Includes guided coding exercises using Python and popular ML libraries.
part3: 11:20 - 12:00 Hands-on: Building Your First ML Model

title: Sustainable Business Practices
expert_experience: Sustainability consultant for 18 years, helped 200+ companies achieve carbon neutrality, UN climate advisor
description: Transform your business with sustainable practices that benefit both the planet and your bottom line. Learn ESG reporting, circular economy principles, and green supply chain management.
part2: 10:40 - 11:20 Keynote: The Future of Sustainable Business
